The attempt of a boycott is currently underway for Dead by Daylight. For the next 3 months we are going to cease all sales, and stop buying everything BHVR releases. This includes cosmetics, rifts, and the next Chapter. BHVR has treated the health of the game poorly and ignored the community for the past 2 years, with it only getting worse and worse. If you are reading this and want DBD, wait for the next 3 months before you get it, and check in to see if anything has changed.

#BoycottDBD

Isto será um longo texto... Dead By Daylight é um jogo que propriamente me prendeu por muito tempo, do qual eu tinha tempo livre pois sou um grande de um vagabundo. Porém, sou um vagabundo informado, isto é, sei diferenciar um joguinho de quinta categoria de um jogo excelentíssimo, como o Fortnite. Dead By Daylight é um jogo do gênero que você pode jogar com seus amigos e divertir-se muito, fazendo com que eles morram de forma incrivelmente estúpidas, ou humilhando o assassino dando tea-bag e outros gestos ofensivos para a comunidade como um todo. Mas, o que as pessoas não enxergam é a visão do assassino, porque QUALQUER tipo de estratégia utilizada para MATAR os sobreviventes - que é o seu principal objetivo -, é sempre atacada pelos chorões que NÃO SABEM perder, e também não sabem o quão sofrido é VOCÊ DE ASSASSINO PEGAR 4 CARAS RANK 1, DOS QUAIS OS 4 SÃO DEUSES NA PORRA DO JOGO E TEM PELO MENOS O DOBRO DE HORAS DE VOCÊ. AS HITBOXES DO JOGO SÃO UMA MERDA, OS ASSASSINOS SÃO UMA MERDA, OS SOBREVIVENTES SÃO UMA MERDA, A COMUNIDADE COMO UM TODO É UMA GRANDISSÍSSIMA DE UMA BELA MERDA, E TUDO ISSO RESULTA EM UM NÚMERO DE JOGADORES ATIVOS RELATIVAMENTE PEQUENA, ACARRETANDO EM UM MAU BALANCEAMENTO, VISTO QUE QUANTO MENOR FOR A QUANTIDADE DE JOGADORES, MENOR SERÁ A QUANTIDADE DE PESSOAS PARA BALANCEAR! Mas, de modo geral, esse jogo é gostosinho de jogar. Recomendo a todas as pessoas e jogadores de Fortnite.

Many players seem to have a love/hate relationship with Dead By Daylight.

I seem to be in the minority of players who just... genuinely enjoy this game. It's fun, and I'm glad it exists.

>Devs don't listen to the community
>Focus on new cosmetics and (lame) events
>Should probably fix the hitboxes, survivor queue times, and overall balance
>Half the perks are non-viable unless you have absolute mastery of the game
>80% of the game is locked behind DLC
>What's a ranking system

The best redeeming quality of this game is custom matches with friends, where everything is unlocked (except for other characters/killers, which is almost all of them). I really want to play this game more, but it just becomes not fun after a point. Hope they fix things in the future...but sadly, they probably won't.

EDIT: Many updates later, nothing. They're not fixing anything. Don't waste your money, this game sucks. The devs are a joke, nothing works anymore. Uninstall this game and never look back.
這個遊戲坦白說不是到一等一的，但是卻是個不錯的競技遊戲。雖然對於剛上手的玩家難度有點高，但是熟悉後便會發現錮中樂趣。另外，官方可以多修BUG嗎!並且對殺手好一點，謝謝。

Fun as the game can be, as much promise as it truly has as a game. The game is forever broken in one way or another. Band-aid's are put on broken aspects of the game. Problems are "fixed" by the developers but it only seems to cause more problems which can happen with coding something as complex as this game, I understand that much. But other "problems" are addressed and "fixed" when they weren't asked to be fixed by the community; these problems so minor in comparison to larger issues involving game play itself but those larger issues for months and months appear to be white washed over or brushed aside.

New content DLC seems to be released on a regular time schedule as much as patches to fix the games less glaring problems, almost as if the company is trying to wave a shiny new thing in front of your face to distract you from the dumpster fire burning directly behind you. There is a reason so many call it "Broken by Daylight" or "Glitched by Daylight", and it doesn't seem like it is getting any better.

The game is changed in ways that were never asked for by the community because it is apparently "better" for the game but it only seems to cause even more problems. The reporting system post match doesn't appear to be anything other than a complaint forum that looks like it goes unchecked like a bloated and overstuffed mailbox of a long since abandoned house still getting junk mail.

Involving people who hack the game, there doesn't appear to be a direct way to report your claim. One personal experience I had was involving someone using glaringly obvious speed hacks. Had video proof, the user ID, game time and such. Went to where we were supposed to turn in such complaints and proof involving such and was given a return email of apology from the customer service team stating that there was nothing they could do about people hacking the game. That they couldn't do anything about the individual hacking.

The community itself can be outright toxic, though not everyone is, there does seem to be a massive sense of entitlement on both sides of the playing field. Yes I play both Killer and Survivor and I'm calling both sides out on their B.S. as there is always an endless flow of complaint pages on forums; page after page of "This ability is too OP, NERF IT because it's abusive to such and such.". The Dev's do tend to give in after the constant badgering of such and do so to appease the masses rather than just focusing on making the game they want. It's a fan service game basically.

Why? Cause of money. The company wants the money, and I don't blame them for it. That's their job, their food, bills, etc. But still there is a line that needs to be drawn where the people need to either just live with the fact that their self entitlement isn't going to get them what they want and they can either F-Off and play something else, or they can shut up and play the game and let the Dev's make the game they wanted to from the begining. Let them focus on fixing the problem rather than trying to appease self-entitled Killers and Survivors.

This review seems excessively negative, I admit but I'm just telling it as it is. Things need fixed extremely, but the company is too focused on pandering to their player base just to keep the game afloat. Like giving a spoiled child everything they demand just to keep them from crying for years and then one day trying to set down rules and finding that the child isn't having any of it.

So you might question, if I find the game so bad, why am I playing it? Why do I still play it? Why do I stream it? There are plenty of big time streamers who have said they'd love to stream something other than DBD. That they hate the game ow and what it's become. But they do it because that is where their fan/viewer-base is and what they want to watch being played.

Not to mention that for all its bad, there are good things about the game. The visuals, the unique characters, the thrill of getting out of a situation you know should have ended you whether it be because you were being outplayed by someone else or because you ran into a bug in the game that was seriously hindering your abilities as a player. We're human, we like to overcome challenges and that is what this game is. It's a brick wall we keep slamming into because at one point on impact, we noticed a crack; and another time we saw a brick move just slightly.

But yes, the game has it's positives that are most of the time, including in the heat of the moment, get drowned in the negatives. But it's simply that, I play as much as others even now because of the challenge and desire to overcome the odds that are stacked against us.

But there is going to come a point in time where something else is going to be released as the next big thing. Before then, DBD and its developing company need to make the choice of whether to let the game just sink away into the shadows of the bottomless ocean of the gaming world, or they need to plug up the holes in their life boat and do what they can to stay afloat if not going that extra mile to turn their game into something that will outshine every other game that tries to come against it.

If ye dont like buggy games, I suggest ya turn around right now, cause this game is filled with em like Chernobyl is filled with radioactive cockroaches. 

There is also a decent amount of desync now. Desync basically means the killer hitting ya when he shouldn't have hit ya, you are outside of range but get hit anyway.

This is a PvP game, with two sides: killer and survivor, whichever you pick, you will get to meet lots of toxic people on the other side of the coin, but there are also a lot of decent players.

The developer team is actively leading this game down the killer side path lately(march 2021 currently) and I am pretty pissed with that despite playing both sides(killer more lately). Also their balancing of new maps and reworked maps is as good as The Hag's ass.

As I said earlier the developers are leaning on the killer side so the new perks survivors get are so bad I wouldn't put em on unless someone paid me. The killer perks.... well I already got em all since they are so fucking good.

OK, I said so much bad stuff about the game, so why am I recommending it. Well this game is like fucking crack, once ya start enjoying it, ya cant stop. It's that fun. But still I don't suggest going in solo if ya don't have some tough nerves, drag a few friends along with ya.

Jeu de merde, aucun équilibrage, une communauté cancer, des développeur de merde qui n'en on rien a foutre de l'avis des joueurs. Des bug, cheese, cheat et autre a la pelle. Aucun intérêt.
This game is so shit, but damn it's fun.

Bon par où commencer ? Il y a encore quelques mois je vous aurai dit que ce jeu était très bien, qu'il y avait quelque bug mais que ça aller en s'améliorant. J'ai commencé à y jouer il y a maintenant 3 ans environs. Après environ 1500 heures de jeu voilà mes conclusions.

Ce jeux avait tout le potentiel pour devenir un excellent jeu, un principe simple, des personnages interessant, des défis intressants. Cependant, le fait que les developpeurs se tape totalement de l'avis des joueurs donne a ce jeu un gout de cendre bien ecoeurant. Chaque mise à jour ajoute de nouveau bug et de nouvelles façon de jouer cancer. L'équilibre déjà fragile entre survivants et tueurs, déjà fragile depuis quelque mois, est maintenant clairement non respecté et ne va pas s'améliorer. Je joue autant suvivant que tueur, et bien que le jeu à très haut niveau favorise les survivants ce n'est qu'a haut niveau ... A niveau conventionnel, les tueurs vont plus vite que les survivants, leurs capacités sont bien supérieures à celles des survivants, chaque petit espoir que nous avions disparaisse petit a petit. La prochaine mise à jours, en plus de fournir à un tueur (qui semble déjà exagerément fort) trois capacités incroyablement forte, donnera un dernier coup de blues aux survivant en les privant de la protection qu'accordait la capacités "coup décisif". Tout le jeu pousse les tueurs ET les survivants à jouer cancer (camping, tunnel, slug, teabag etc.). 

Pire encore, lorsque l'on soumet au dev une vidéo prouvant clairement qu'un joueur cheat (je vous met la vidéo plus bas pour preuve) ou que l'on propose une idée qui permettrait de supprimer ces comportement cancer, les développeurs vous répondent qu'ils s'en tapent sans la moindre la honte...

Donc pour moi ce jeu avait un potentiel démentiel mais les choix des développeur m'ont dégoutés du jeu, passant d'une moyenne d'environ 200 heure de jeu par mois à tout juste une dizaine. Ce n'est pas sans une certaine mélancolie et sentiment de trahison de la part des développeur que je désinstalle ce jeu.

P.S.: Voici [ url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=93hrnBGWGT8"]le lien[url] permettant de voir la vidéo d'un cheateur que j'ai prise et envoyé au developpeurs du jeu, sans que cela n'engendre aucun retour...

Naja was soll ich sagen? Das Spiel ist ein Wechselbad der Gefühle, man kann wirklich von Hass-Liebe sprechen. 

An und für sich ist das Spiel wirklich gut, selten gibt es Bugs, diese werden in der Regel zügig gefixed. 
Gerade als Full-Pre Lobby hat Dead by Daylight einen großen Spaßfaktor. Sobald Randoms dabei sind kann dieser Spaß schnell verfliegen, es empfiehlt sich jegliche egoistischen Perks dabei zu haben, weil Randoms häufig "Jeder für sich" bedeutet. Aber auch so ist es spielbar.
Erst wenn Basement Bubba oder Camping Clown dabei sind hört der Spaß auf. Eigentlich kein Problem, nervig, aber definitiv aushaltbar. Wenn der Killer jedoch ein 4K durch Camping und Tunneling erreicht, dann schreibt "ez win" und nicht mal einsieht, dass es trash war.. Gut, dann ist auch meine Geduld am Ende. 
Also man sieht, dass selbst das beste Spiel durch die Community in den Dreck gezogen werden kann.

Absolutely one of my favorite games of all time. I have been watching this game since way before it went on console and have played hundreds of hours (on console) and now that i have a PC It's just better. Now i know that there are some pretty bad problems with this game but i have faith in it since this is just a great game to play with friends and even by yourself with some super creative killers. 
I would say the worst part about this game is the load times, they can honestly be a mood killer especially with friends that don't have the greatest patience and some player can be more toxic than actual poison. IMO i think the good out ways the bad and i hope it continues grow and make the game even more fun for killer and survivors alike.

P.S. My Mom even loves playing this game
